survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to understand their experiences, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input. Use a radio button for single-choice selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional text field for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE)

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Which electric scooter sharing service(s) have you used in the past 3 months?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.

script.question_text: Which electric scooter sharing service(s) have you used in the past 3 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of finding and unlocking an electric scooter?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of finding and unlocking an electric scooter?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Provide a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. If 'Yes' is selected, route to Q8.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with conditional routing to Q8 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Please describe the safety concern(s) you experienced.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather details about safety concerns. Provide a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe the safety concern(s) you experienced.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend electric scooter sharing services to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you recommend electric scooter sharing services to others?
